channel.title: Hokkaido on Clusters and Climate
channel.description: Recent content in Hokkaido on Clusters and Climate

item.title: Wild Onsen near Mt. Shikaribetsu in Shikaoi, Hokkaido
item.description: Enjoying the wild onsen near Mt. Shikaribetsu Japan is world famous for its serene natural beauty, making it a paradise for bicycling, camping, and hiking.

item.title: Sapporo Jozankei Nature Village: A Campsite Guide
item.description: Sapporo Jozankei Nature Village is a campsite about 45 minutes by car from Sapporo, nestled in the deep Jozankei forest near Houheikyou Onsen and dam.
